svg.title: Rattus pubis

text.tspan: Uporaba tlorisa: Nad tlorisom pritisni in dr≈æi levo tipko
na mi≈°ki ter se pomikaj po tlorisu. Osvetljeni del tlori-
sa je hkrati viden tudi v prvoosebnem pogledu. Ob
Groud plan usage: While over the ground plan press
and hold the left mouse button and move ovet the
plan. The illuminated part of the ground plan can
be simultaneously seen in the firs person view. At
the button release the plan closes.

g.text: beli obrisi tvorijo predmete v sobi
white outlines form objects in the room
notranje in zunanje povezave so v oran≈æni barvi
internal and external links are in orange
